name: Chop Chop (Mobile)
description:
PC Version: https://lildyll.itch.io/chop-chop

Use your Joystick to move your lumberjack around the field. Dash into logs to cut them by pressing the 'Dash' button. You can dash every 2 seconds but it resets if you cut a log. See how long you can last and how many logs you can cut before there's too much!
This was made in 3 hours for Trijam 212 with the theme "Too Much."
